channel.title: (reapage)adding item bonus's(v2)
channel.description:
Problem:(Adding new item bonus's)
source:(reapage scape v2)
Client:(naderpkz v2 client) shows d claws, d pl8 and bunch more customs
Help:I need help with the customs on my server to make bonus's.
I want to add this in item.cfg for Dragon claws [size=7pt]item = 8002 Dragon_Claws A_Very_Powerful_Pair_Of_claws. 655000000 655000000 655000000 0 150 75 0 0 0 0 0 0 0 56 8[/size]
Yet when i log on it has 0 everything in bonus's...... Anyone know how to fix this???

item.title: (reapage)adding item bonus's(v2)
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:3, topic:292739”]1) make sure you use the tab key.
2) make sure 8002 isn’t already an ID in item.cfg
3) make sure you have dragon claws in class8.java[/quote]

yeah thoughs are also things you have to check .

Read full topic

item.title: (reapage)adding item bonus's(v2)
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

  1. make sure you use the tab key.
  2. make sure 8002 isn’t already an ID in item.cfg
  3. make sure you have dragon claws in class8.java

Read full topic

item.title: (reapage)adding item bonus's(v2)
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

experiment .
change thoughs 0’s to the bonuses you want your dclaws to be -.-

Read full topic
